data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Sirnak to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sirnak, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Sirnak.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 29 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Sirnak, Turkey.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Sirnak, Turkey to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Sirnak unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Chechen people might believe through him.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sirnak, Turkey that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Sirnak against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sirnak, Turkey has a population of 475,300.

We estimate Sirnak has 178 people who might know Jesus, 2,661 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 472,461 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,670 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 178 believers in Sirnak to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
